title: What is the Doha tennis schedule?
description: Novak Djokovic's first singles match since the Australian Open headlines Tuesday's order of play at the Qatar ExxonMobil Open. There are plenty of exciting Lexus ATP Head2Head matchups to watch in Doha, where second seed Alex de Minaur and fifth seed Andrey Rublev will also be in action. View the full Tuesday schedule below. ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 18 FEBRUARY 2025 Center Court - start 2:30 p.m. Roman Safiullin vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Karen Khachanov vs [4] Daniil Medvedev Not Before 5:30 p.m. [3] Novak Djokovic (SRB) vs Matteo Berrettini (ITA) [6] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs [SE] Hamad Medjedovic (SRB) Grandstand 1 - start 2:30 p.m. [Q] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs [WC] Abdullah Shelbayh (JOR) Not Before 4 p.m. [5] Andrey Rublev vs Alexander Bublik (KAZ) [Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) vs [Q] Petr Nouza (CZE) / Patrik Rikl (CZE) Grandstand 2 - start 2:30 p.m. Zhizhen Zhang (CHN) vs [Q] Luca Nardi (ITA) Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) Matthew Ebden (AUS) / Joran Vliegen (BEL) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL) vs [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) Grandstand 3 - start 2:30 p.m. [LL] Otto Virtanen (FIN) vs Nuno Borges (POR) Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED) Followed By After suitable rest - [4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Nuno Borges (POR) [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / John Peers (AUS) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Doha

Djokovic, De Minaur among stars in action

February 18, 2025

QTF/Paul Zimmer

By ATP Staff

Novak Djokovic's first singles match since the Australian Open headlines Tuesday's order of play at the Qatar ExxonMobil Open.

There are plenty of exciting Lexus ATP Head2Head matchups to watch in Doha, where second seed Alex de Minaur and fifth seed Andrey Rublev will also be in action.

View the full Tuesday schedule below.

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 18 FEBRUARY 2025

Center Court - start 2:30 p.m.
Roman Safiullin vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS)
Karen Khachanov vs [4] Daniil Medvedev

Not Before 5:30 p.m.
[3] Novak Djokovic (SRB) vs Matteo Berrettini (ITA)
[6] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs [SE] Hamad Medjedovic (SRB)

Grandstand 1 - start 2:30 p.m.
[Q] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs [WC] Abdullah Shelbayh (JOR)

Not Before 4 p.m.
[5] Andrey Rublev vs Alexander Bublik (KAZ)
[Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN)
Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) vs [Q] Petr Nouza (CZE) / Patrik Rikl (CZE)

Grandstand 2 - start 2:30 p.m.
Zhizhen Zhang (CHN) vs [Q] Luca Nardi (ITA)
Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP)
Matthew Ebden (AUS) / Joran Vliegen (BEL) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR)
Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL) vs [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER)

Grandstand 3 - start 2:30 p.m.
[LL] Otto Virtanen (FIN) vs Nuno Borges (POR)
Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) vs Tallon Griekspoor (NED)

Followed By
After suitable rest - [4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Nuno Borges (POR)
[1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / John Peers (AUS)
